sub_topic: Identifying the clique number of a graph.
message_1: What is the size of the maximum clique in a graph G with 9 vertices that has a clique number of 3?
message_2: The maximum clique size in a graph G with 9 vertices and a clique number of 3 is 3. The clique number represents the size of the largest complete subgraph (clique) within the graph. In this case, the largest clique has 3 vertices, so the maximum clique size is 3.
